requirements.summary: Trigger a fresh rebuild/deployment from the latest code without changing application behavior or UI copy.
acceptanceCriteria: A new build is produced from the current codebase (not reusing the previous Draft Version 11 artifact).
The newly built version is deployed successfully and is accessible to testers/users via the platformâ€™s deployment URL.
If the platform distinguishes between draft and live, the rebuilt version is the one intended for production/live availability (not left as an unpublished draft).
No application features or user-facing UI text are changed as part of this request; this is a deployment action only.

file_operations.description: Add a rebuild marker file (e.g., containing a timestamp or build-note) to ensure a new frontend artifact is produced; do not reference this file from the UI and do not add user-facing text.
Add/adjust a non-rendered HTML comment noting the rebuild trigger (no changes to visible UI text, title, or functionality) to ensure the deployment pipeline detects a source change.
